real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> does not count final goods
real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> estimates an economy’s potential, not its actual performance
real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>GDP</mi></math> does not account for nonmarket transactions
